nodes.long_description:
Hit with a physics engine that feels more like tennis than any other game.  Move around the entire court while quickly and accurately lining up return shots.  Dominate the bot in drills, rallies, and matches then show your mettle online!

Court Time Tennis is the passion project of Eric Malafeew, once chief architect of Harmonix, current cofounder of VirZOOM, tennis player since childhood and simulation geek.

* Practice and play online matches around the world using your Meta avatar
* Move around the whole court and hit with realistic physics that you can tune
* Play indoors through a virtual portal or passthrough venue in larger spaces
* Earn stars and climb leaderboards with 20+ game drills, rallies, and minigames
* Choose between hardcourt, grass, or clay surfaces in park, club, and arena venues
* When you have the space to swing, attach your Quest controller to a real racket or extender
* Get ready for matches against the ball bot, and never have to pick up balls again
* Customize difficulty settings including wind and design your own drills

Join the Discord https://discord.com/invite/sgZpkJDydF
nodes.short_description: Hit with a physics engine that feels more like tennis than any other game.  Move around the entire court while quickly and accurately lining up return shots.  Dominate the bot in drills, rallies, and matches then show your mettle online!

nodes.long_description:
PRACTICE AND IMPROVE YOUR TENNIS GAME FROM HOME

In virtual reality you can always get court time!  Move anywhere on the court and smoothly line up returns.  Address the ball and see your swing just like real life.  Hit shots with spin, power, and aim that go exactly where you want.  Express your full tennis game and then improve it with drills, rallies, and matches. 

Court Time Tennis was created for active and aspiring tennis players alike, on Meta Quest for a portable wireless VR experience.

REALISTIC PHYSICS AND CONTROL
CTT feels like real tennis, not an arcade version of tennis.

20+ CUSTOM DRILLS
Get high scores and climb leaderboards while improving all parts of your game.

PLAY AT YOUR LEVEL
Fine tune the difficulty of every activity, with optional aim assistance and guides.

ATTACH A RACKET
When you have more space to swing, attach your Quest controller to a racket or extender.

DRILL LAB
Make your own drills of up to four shots, with any speed, height, spin, aim, position, and target.

INTRODUCING BALL BOT
Rally and play games against a futuristic ball bot that moves and hits like a real player.

THREE COURT SURFACES
Play on regular hardcourt, fast and low grass, or slow and high clay.

CHOOSE A LOCATION
Work your way up from park to club to arena!

LIV MOBILE SUPPORT
Record and share your sessions in mixed reality from your phone.
nodes.short_description:
PRACTICE AND IMPROVE YOUR TENNIS GAME FROM HOME

In virtual reality you can always get court time!  Move anywhere on the court and smoothly line up returns.  Address the ball and see your swing just like real life.  Hit shots with spin, power, and aim that go exactly where you want.  Express your full tennis game and then improve it with drills, rallies, and matches. 

Court Time Tennis was created for active and aspiring tennis players alike, on Meta Quest for a portable wireless VR experience.

nodes.change_log:
It's the end of early access!  Thank you all for helping Court Time Tennis become a Quest Store app.

All early access players will have a 33% discount ($9.99 from the $14.99 store price) to unlock the full game.  The free demo is now 30 min, the same as try-before-you-buy.  Only the tutorial and tee-ball drills are free outside the demo.

GAMEPLAY:
   New Break Out minigame
   - Clear waves of progressively smaller targets on Wall
   Change wall scoring to target areas you hit in
   Allow player to move within expanded foot circle
   - rallies to forehands/backhands/either automatically aim within the circle 
   - larger circles reduce autorun
   Don't allow backspin on bot serves
   Delay bot serve in Passthrough venue after player reaches red circle
   Filter assisted/unassisted online players for challenges
   Don't show unavailable players for challenges
   Autorun backs up less eagerly
   Wait for multiplayer starter to commit before joiner can start
   Add stats after drill, rally, match, and multiplayer modes

VISUALS:
   Animate cone rings to indicate bot spin
   Show court outline on startup screen in passthrough venue
   UI polish
   Bot animations

FIXES:
   Fix "infinite rally" message to say the bot rarely misses
   Don't remind players to move with joystick in Passthrough venue
   Fixed Infinite Rally to allow movement in Passthrough venue
   Allow early tutorial exit without repeating it
   Don't toss ball on main menu in one hand mode

1.9.1:
   Fixed one-controller serves
   Reset multiplayer stats after practice
   Restore 90 fps to Quest 3

1.9.2:
   Fix rally stats when no balls were hit to one side
   Fix playing specific bot animation
